publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2631.2 Peter Peacock: Abolition of Council Tax-As an amendment to motion (S1M-2631) in the name of Tommy Sheridan, leave out from first "believes" to end and insert "welcomes the substantial reforms that the Scottish Executive has brought to the operation of local government finance, including the stability for three year council tax figures and welcomes the Executive's commitment to pursue further reforms; further welcomes the fact that councils are now collecting a higher proportion of council tax than ever before and the continuing work by the Executive and local authorities to better target and further improve collection arrangements, and notes that the Local Government Committee of the Parliament will shortly conclude its inquiry into local government finance and local taxation. Supported by: Mr Andy Kerr*
